data.name: Pretty girl cube
data.detailed_description:
Casual and strategic gameplay

The main goal of the game is to continuously pass the levels, get gold coins and then unlock the cg illustrations. The condition for customs clearance is to click the block with the mouse to turn it over. When the images of the two blocks turned out are different, they will automatically return to their original positions, otherwise they will not return to their original positions. So you need to remember the avatar of the block, and when all the blocks are turned over successfully, you can pass the level and get gold coins. Each level is set with the number of times that can be turned over. When the number of times is exhausted and all the blocks have not been turned over, the game fails. The further the level is, the fewer times you can turn it over, and the more blocks and gold coins you need to turn over.

Colorful cg illustrations

The illustrations are full of beautiful girly images, whether you like black silk, sprites with pointed ears, or uniforms to play, you can find them in this game.

data.short_description: "Pretty girl cube" is a beautiful girl 3D cube game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: i3 560
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 534 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5 9400f
  • Memory: 249 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Adult Content Disclaimer: The game's cg illustrations contain themes, scantily clad women, nudity, bondage, and sexual intercourse. All CG illustration characters in the game are over 18 years old.
